item.title: Php Myadmin
item.description: phpmyadmin å¤šhost edit confi.inc.php $i++; /* Authentication type */ $cfg['Servers'][$i]['auth_type'] = 'config'; /* Server parameters */ $cfg['Servers'][$i]['host'] = 'localhost'; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['user'] = 'root'; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['password'] = '123456'; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['compress'] = false; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowNoPassword'] = true; $i++; /* Authentication type */ $cfg['Servers'][$i]['auth_type'] = 'config'; /* Server parameters */ $cfg['Servers'][$i]['host'] = 'localhost2'; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['user'] = 'root'; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['password'] = '123456'; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['compress'] = false; $cfg['Servers'][$i]['AllowNoPassword'] = true;
